motto: Programming fills me with anticipation every day, making life exciting and fun with every idea.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: I am an engineer specializing in front-end technologies. Welcome to my resume page! Here you will find a summary of my professional experience, projects, and skills. If you are interested in my background and capabilities, please feel free to contact me!

contact.description:
Feel free to contact me via email or social media,
and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
